name: TD Ultimate (Restocked)
description: TD Ultimate is combination of Tower Defense with RPG and Shooter elements. From every genre we have taken the best parts, so player can come up with his own tactics and get through challenging waves with a favourite style!
minimum_requirements: 最低配置: 操作系统: Windows 7/8/10 处理器: Intel Core i5 内存: 4 GB RAM 图形: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 550 /  AMD Radeon R7 250 DirectX 版本: 9.0 存储空间: 需要 3 GB 可用空间 声卡: Integrated
